Title: They're Back, Aren't They?
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Tom Kapinos (developed by), Ildy Modrovich, Mike Costa (executive story editor), Chris Rafferty (executive story editor), Julia Fontana (story editor)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, Tricia Helfer
Plot: Lucifer enlists Chloe to figure out how he wound up in the desert with his wings back.
